messages.message:
Whats the level of work for Cluster to be updated in that:
-You point at a folder and you have the option to Process Files (minor check to see if files are already processed so you don't need to re-run)
-Compute Clusters (with an easy way to adjust weights)
-See the output in the current screen

Nice to have:
-Be able to preview files from the Cluster screen (so you can adjust weights or just see what files you are looking at)
-Label the Clusters
-Generate folders and place the files from their clusters into their respective folder
